urls.title: WATCH: UK Chief Medic confirms (again) covid19 harmless to vast majority
urls.description: From the beginning of this crisis we have been pointing out that there are two mutually contradictory messages at the heart of the covid19 rollout, and, just as Orwell describes in 1984, a major po…

text:
if enough people would wake up to the pea-and-thimble trick being pulled on them, then the most dangerous and far-reaching coup against human liberty we have ever seen would essentially be stopped in its tracks.

#COVIDー19
